data.text: @VanSpaic Hi! We're sorry to hear that you've had this experience with us. Please fill out the complaints form on our official website and the colleagues will look into it for you: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV
@lexibeqiri Hi. We always advise to arrive according to the original time. The gate opening/closing times might not change.

@jamescullen96 Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.

data.text: @MANOJKU11563001 Hi. You need to present the boarding pass on the official application or in printed form. Kindly check the mobile boarding pass availability here before your trip: https://t.co/Fpo1uJKgpm
@shanners5 Hi. Meal vouchers are either sent out via email automatically or handed out by our staff at the airport.

domain.name: Business Taxonomy

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent and related to foods & beverages such as snacks, soft drinks, beers.

data.text: @fisher_jakob Hi. The Flex refund takes 72 hours max. If you need help with anything then please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre: https://t.co/th7YMTfpmi

@rosieeeb3 Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.
